item.title: CVE-2024-29813|2024-03-27T12:04:00.622Z -- CartFlows Inc. -- Funnel Builder by CartFlows
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CartFlows Inc. Funnel Builder by CartFlows allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Funnel Builder by CartFlows: from n/a through 2.0.1.
